sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
overlaps another
, en njen del prekriva del druge stvari.

seg.quote: A quilt must overlap the sides of the bed.

sense.def:
Dve zamisli ali dejavnosti
overlap
, kadar se nanašata na isto vsebino, osebe ali obdobja.

seg.quote: The work of the inspectors overlaps with that of the internal auditors.
We worked overlapping shifts so there were always two of us on duty.
There is no overlap between our material and that of Lipset.
